185568995.review: Played this chaotic platformer a couple of times a while back, and I remember enjoying it a lot. It was fast-paced, had good music, momentum building, slow-mo, and wiggling through the map with fun abilities and physics. It had it all. It's also a great time killer and brought back memories of all those YouTube videos that had this in background.

185547887.review: This is a no-nonsense platformer that doesn't require the quickest reactions but has some of the most over-the-top and wild level designs. This game is often on a steep discount, which makes it easy to recommend.

185474939.review:
Great 3D First-person platformer, and a small little game, that was quite enjoyable through start to finish. Something great to play on your second monitor, it's a bit short as i finished it in 4 hours,but if you really like the game and want more of it, the game has [b]a level editor and steam workshop [/b] for virtually infinite levels.

i give it a 10/10 , what you see in the marketing steam trailers for this game is what you get, literally.

185208803.review: Çoğu kişinin bildiği o meşhur, zorlaşana kadar çok keyifli geçen kamyonlardan kamyonlara atladığımız bir platform oyunu. Maksimum eğlenceyi başlangıçtan itibaren almaya başlayacaksınız. Fazla ilerlemeye başladıkça zorlaşan yerlerde ekstra çaba göstermeniz gerekeceği için duygularınıza hakim olmakta fayda var. Havada yön verme, uçup en ileriye gitme gibi avantajlar size oyunda bonus mutluluk sağlıyor. İyi fikir, chill müzik, eğlenceli ortam.

185167561.review:
Классику знать надо!
Довольно-таки простенькая, но от этого не менее интересная и захватывающая игра, которая в буквальном смысле реализовывает твою детскую мечту - прыгать на скорости по транспортным средствам.
Причём разработчики очень классно поработали над сложностью уровней - под конец тебе реально уже хочется выкинуть компьютер в окно, но потом после сотой попытки ты проходишь и такое приятное послевкусие..
По итогу, если вам нужно отключить мозги и просто порефлексировать во что-то весёлое и энергичное - Clustertruck как раз про это.

185165468.review: 跑酷爽爆;音乐带感! 犹豫什么? 快快入手~

185160013.review:
Nostalgia pura este juego, si te gusta lo frenetico y que cada dos segundos sientas una contraccion en el 4n*, este es tu juego;

me tomo poco mas de 2 horas y medias completar el juego al 100% y siendo sinceros, lo complete al 100% de pura suerte, ya que tuve que ponerme de acuerdo con un amigo para completar uno de los logros.

es un excelente juego, mas aun si te encanta la adrenalina; pero ojito con el rage quit

casi pareciera que el juego esta echo con esa intencion, ya que varias veces deje tirada mi partida XD

7/10, no lo volveria a jugar ni a palos, pero es un excelente juego

185154199.review:
Неплохая игра, с абилками легко проходится, без абилок есть челлендж.

Есть очень интересные левела, которые можно пройти нестандартными способами и получить кайф от того какой ты крутой.

185130586.review:
A great unity engine game- somehow, clustertruck uses some of the quirks of the unity engine to enhance it's gameplay, such as the weird way that you can pick up momentum by skirting on the sides of trucks, or how you can launch yourself by spamming jump against the back of a truck. 

Great time killer, the final boss can bite me though, hate that thing

8/10

184995484.review:
I'm running out of steam. This platform is an allegory for my dreams and aspirations. Each game being a failed attempt at murder. I haven't practiced, nor would I. But if someone were to oblige, we would be one in the same. I would be loved and make love. I would purchase a house and clothe my new home with all of the things that fill each and every hole that makes up my soul. I would break down, but you would pick me up.

You.

You stood there last night in the bathroom. I told you I took the trash out, but I was lying. You noticed. If we make amends this can all be pushed under the rug. I've bought a new one. It's a vibrant color, one of your favorites. I've adorned our home with yet another pile. Oh, how you love those piles so. It warms me up inside. Next time someone knocks on the door, we'll both get out.

184982817.review: It's a really fast game and it took me about 3-4 days to complete it. It was really enjoyable and I would highly recommend it. Each level took a perfect amount of time to complete so it took me less than twenty minutes but more than 5 minutes. My only concern is the leaderboard. The top world records are either negative or exactly zero, making them impossible to get without cheating.

184937262.review: Приятная игра, о которой я вспомнил недавно. Все видосы и шортсы заполнены этой игрой были когда-то. Игра для отдыха, если используешь способности, без них есть уже какая-то сложность: пару уровней и финальный босс, если его так можно назвать. Простенький геймплей, который заставляет меня иногда вернутся и расслабиться. Но музыка мне не понравилась, решается это просто-включи свою. Подойдет для любителей просто хорошо провести 30мин-1 час времени, а также выпустить пар, если включены абилки. 7,9/10

184553576.review: Clustertruck é aquele tipo de jogo que é um caos delicioso. Você corre pulando de caminhão em caminhão, e tudo acontece muito rápido, o que dá uma adrenalina doida. A jogabilidade é simples, mas os desafios são malucos, com obstáculos que parecem tentar te derrubar a cada segundo. Se você curte um jogo frenético e cheio de ação, vai se divertir pra caramba.

184356534.review:
One of the absolute best 3D platformers I've ever played!

From movement, to unique abilities, to MUSIC, to level design - everything just seems to fit perfectly! Not only that but the premise (of jumping around on trucks) leads to funny situations that had me laughing regularly. :D
I had the most fun at grinding records and beating my old times again and again. 
This game takes a spot in my top 10 games of all time, thanks for all the fun!

184349881.review:
[h1]Clustertruck[/h1]

It's fun at start, but as you are getting closer to the end it becomes disgustingly difficult, although it's definitely doable. You unlock a big percentage of the achievments by completing the campaign. The other one are also relatively easy, except "Pure", where you have to complete the game without any abilites. That one was hella difficult. 
Off-topic: I don't know if anyone ever had the same issue, but I lost all my abilities I purchased in one session when I opened the game another time. Which made  the "Fully Loaded" achievement very difficult.

Anyway, the game is great, I'd give it a 9/10.

184331600.review: if there was an option in between yes and no i would choose that

184239981.review: Gra typu lubie skakac po tirach

184187402.review: Jogo rápido e divertido, me lembrou o estilo de Portal, inclusive, outro jogo que vale a pena. Em minha opinião, este jogo foi feito para se jogar como forma de ´relaxar´ após terminar jogos grandes, como AC Odyssey, The Witcher 3 entre outros. Ele também pode ser jogado para se zerar rapidamente, meu caso, e terminar ele no mesmo dia, inclusive, após terminar este jogo, tive mais ´vigor´para enfrentar outros jogos mais longos. Em resumo, compre quando estiver em promoção e deixe guardado para jogar em momentos parecidos ou como estes citados, ou, faça como eu, e termine no mesmo dia da compra kkkkk.

184187326.review:
Divertido e viciante

DISCLAIMER: Tenho quase certeza que a versão de Console é mais difícil que a versão de PC.

Uma boa diversão despretensiosa para quem curte jogos de plataforma, lembro que na versão de console tem um pico de dificuldade enorme na última fase, o jogo no geral tem uma dificuldade mediana e a última fase era muito difícil, no PC o jogo como um todo é mais fácil o que me fez sentir falta da dificuldade.

É um jogo barato, com um nível de entretenimento alto, e que você consegue termina-lo em uma tarde, recomendo.

184174899.review: Uno de los mejores plataformers 3D, es simple y absurdo, el caos aleatorio es muy divertido y frenético, la dificultad es justa. Es corto pero memorable.

184174447.review: At the beginning it's quite fun but after you progress in game it gets annoying, buggy and unplayable for my taste

184150046.review: A short, cheap(on sale), very fun platformer.  I thoroughly enjoyed 100%ing this game and if you are into any sort of movement based gameplay you should check out clustertruck

183947851.review: The game's mechanics are fun for about 10 minutes, but when you get into actually playing the game and trying to beat it, all the flaws show themselves very clearly. Trying to beat a level and finding out that X jump gives Y momentum and going to utilize said jump only to find out that it only gives Y momentum when the game feels like it should is very frustrating. A note for anyone trying to beat 9-10 (for the Pure achievement or otherwise), when reaching the button, land on the back side of it - away from the truck you jump off of, if you hit it right, you'll trigger every sequence of the button and 1-shot the boss.

183549136.review:
Clustertruck is hands down the GREATEST game in the history of ALL video games EVER, and I’m not even exaggerating (well, maybe just a little, but it’s THAT GOOD)!!!



First off, this game is a MASTERPIECE of chaotic energy wrapped in an adrenaline-filled package of pure AWESOME. Ever thought, "What if I could parkour across a stampede of trucks flying off cliffs, defying gravity, and somehow still look cool doing it?" NO?? WELL, Clustertruck thought of that FOR YOU, and it's everything you didn't know you needed in life!!



THE GAMEPLAY??? UNREAL. It's that perfect mix of madness and skill that forces you to channel your inner parkour ninja while dodging explosions, flipping trucks, and dealing with physics that make you question EVERYTHING. It's not a game; it's an experience. One moment you are flying through the air, an eagle of sorts, and the next-you've face-planted into a truck side because YOU blinked for that one microsecond. AND YOU WILL LOVE EVERY SECOND OF IT.



THE LEVEL DESIGN?? ICONIC. Each level is just a backhand to your sense of normalcy: lasers, collapsing terrain, portals to who-knows-where, and SO MANY flying trucks you'd think Elon Musk secretly funds the chaos. Every level screams, "You thought THIS was hard? Hold my drink." And yet, you KEEP GOING because you're hooked.



THE MUSIC?? OH MY GOSH, THE MUSIC. The soundtrack is so good that it will make your heart pound like you are running away from a stampede of semi-trucks. It is like the game leans over and says, "You are an action hero now," and then BLASTS the most epic beats you have ever heard in your LIFE. If Clustertruck had its music festival, I'd be FRONT ROW, screaming "THIS IS MY JAM," and you would too.

Love it, fast paced and fun also very cheap
but player hitboxes are dogshit
